item.title: DNS::ZoneParse has an undocumented $ORIGIN
item.description: I was working writing a few scripts that should update a DNS zone file on the fly. I decided to use the DNS::ZoneParse perl module for convenience. The example there is straightforward for changing MX records so I thought modifying it to change an A record should be a piece of cake. Right? Wrong! For the love of it I couldn’t get my code to modify the record in question, it would always delete it.
